line.text: UT: Why are you killing my little friends?! You monsters!

response.text: UT: These bugs are your 'friends?' I think you've been stuck down here far too long there, slappy...

line.text: UT: How dare you! Not only do you mercilesly slaughter my friends, but you killed my fiancees... *sob*

response.text: UT: 'Fiancees?!' You mean you... and... the queen bugs... AAAHHHH! *shudder* What's your major malfunction, son?

line.text: UT: Enough! You will pay for your murders! Come my friends, let us avenge our fallen loved ones.
